title: Tree Ring Memory System
description: Technical documentation for the Tree Ring Memory System, a comprehensive context engineering implementation for the Indii Music platform, providing role-specific knowledge access, agent-scoped memory management, and semantic chunking capabilities.
author: William Roberts
preview: The Tree Ring Memory System is a comprehensive context engineering implementation for the Indii Music platform, following the principles outlined in context engineering and memory infrastructure documentation. It provides role-specific knowledge access, agent-scoped memory management, and semantic chunking capabilities.
